author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Employees’ Provident Fund Organisation (EPFO) will conduct ‘Nidhi Aapke Nikat’ at its regional office, Royapettah, from 10.30 a.m. to 5 p.m. on April 11, according to a press release. This is for speedy redressal of long-pending grievances of those covered under the Employees’ Provident Funds and Miscellaneous Provisions Act, 1952. People should register their names with the public relations officer on or before March 31.

For details, call: 28132700.
title: PF redressal meet on April 11
